description: Black leather collar with a small silver bell

core:description.text: A sleek black leather collar that sits snugly around the neck, featuring a small silver bell that chimes softly with every movement. The supple leather is both comfortable and durable, secured with a simple buckle closure. The delicate bell dangles from a silver loop at the front, its clear tone announcing the wearer's presence with a musical quality perfectly suited to a performer. The collar walks the line between playful and elegant, embracing feline nature while maintaining sophistication. A distinctive accessory that adds personality and charm to any ensemble.
